description_BonePickaxeEnabled: A low durability bone pickaxe that can only mine stone not ore. Default = false
description_HealingPrimeMeatRecipeEnable: Prepare primemeat into a healing meat with honey, horsetail and smoking. Default = true
description_ClassRecipesEnabled: Makes some recipes require class traits to craft. Default = true
description_butcheringTableLootMultiplie: Effects the Butchering Tables drop rate. Default = 1
description_SkinningRackLootMultiplier: Effects the Skinning Hooks drop rate. Default = 1
description_AnimalMassMultiplier: Effects how much animals in your inventory slow you down. Default = 1
description_FieldHarvestingLightMode: Field Harvesting can be set to 'Light Mode' which changes the mods usual 50% drop rate (when field harvesting) to 80%. Default = false
